## AppCheckOptions interface

Options for App Check initialization.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AppCheckOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [isTokenAutoRefreshEnabled?](./app-check.appcheckoptions.istokenautorefreshenabled.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If set to true, enables automatic background refresh of App Check token. |
|  [provider](./app-check.appcheckoptions.provider.md) | [CustomProvider](./app-check.customprovider.md) \| [ReCaptchaV3Provider](./app-check.recaptchav3provider.md) | reCAPTCHA provider or custom provider. |
